column1: Little Goat Diner////Came with a decent-sized group for brunch after we couldn't make it to Girl n the Goat the night before
column2: and we were very happy with everything. From the bloody mary and coffee at the beginning of the meal to the french toast for the main course
column3: everything was spectacular. The french toast came with an egg over easy in the middle of it
column4: and while I was initially a little taken aback (probably because I didn't read the menu)
